data.chText: 造成（威胁、问题等）；引起；产生
data.enText: to create a threat, problem, etc. that has to be dealt with

data.chText: 构成威胁 / 挑战 / 危险 / 风险
这项任务不会造成特别的问题。
data.enText: The task poses no special problems .
to ask a question, especially one that needs serious thought
to sit or stand in a particular position in order to be painted, drawn or photographed

data.chText: 代表们摆好姿势准备拍集体照。
data.enText: The delegates posed for a group photograph.
to pretend to be sb in order to trick other people

data.chText: 这伙匪徒冒充工人混进了大楼。
data.enText: The gang entered the building posing as workmen.

before.enText: usually used in the progressive tenses

data.enText: to dress or behave in a way that is intended to impress other people

data.chText: 我看见他开着他的崭新跑车招摇过市。
data.enText: I saw him out posing in his new sports car.
a particular position in which sb stands, sits, etc., especially in order to be painted, drawn or photographed

data.chText: 他摆了个悠闲的姿势拍照。
data.enText: He adopted a relaxed pose for the camera.
a way of behaving that is not sincere and is only intended to impress other people
to hold your body in a particular way to create a particular impression
to hold your body in a particular way to create a particular impression

tr: a deliberate pretense or exaggerated display
affected manners intended to impress others
example: don't put on airs with me

tr: a posture assumed by models for photographic or artistic purposes
be a mystery or bewildering to
example: Got me--I don't know the answer!

tr: pretend to be someone you are not
example: She posed as the Czar's daughter

tr: put into a certain place or abstract location
example: Set the dogs on the scent of the missing children
Place emphasis on a certain point

tr: assume a posture as for artistic purposes
example: We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often

tr: behave affectedly or unnaturally in order to impress others
example: Don't pay any attention to him--he is always posing to impress his peers!
She postured and made a total fool of herself

value.def: If something poses a problem or a danger, it is the cause of that problem or danger.

example.ex: This could pose a threat to jobs in the coal industry...
example.tran: 这可能会给煤炭产业的就业造成威胁。

example.ex: His ill health poses serious problems for the future.
example.tran: 他身体不好，对将来造成严重的隐患。

value.tran: 产生（问题）；造成（威胁、危险等）

value.def: If you pose a question, you ask it. If you pose an issue that needs considering, you mention the issue.

example.ex: When I finally posed the question, 'Why?' he merely shrugged.
example.tran: 当我最后问“为什么”时，他只是耸了耸肩。

example.ex: ...the moral issues posed by new technologies.
example.tran: 新技术带来的道德问题

value.def: If you pose as someone, you pretend to be that person in order to deceive people.

example.ex: The team posed as drug dealers to trap the ringleaders.
example.tran: 该队队员装扮成毒品贩子，诱捕罪犯头目。

value.def: If you pose for a photograph or painting, you stay in a particular position so that someone can photograph you or paint you.

example.ex: Before going into their meeting the six foreign ministers posed for photographs.
example.tran: 开会前，6位外交部长合影留念。

value.tran: 摆姿势（以供人摄影或绘画）

value.def: You can say that people are posing when you think that they are behaving in an insincere or exaggerated way because they want to make a particular impression on other people.

example.ex: He criticized them for dressing outrageously and posing pretentiously.
example.tran: 他批评她们衣着暴露而且矫揉造作。

value.def: A pose is a particular way that you stand, sit, or lie, for example when you are being photographed or painted.

example.ex: We have had several preliminary sittings in various poses.
example.tran: 我们进行了几次预拍摄，摆了各种不同的造型。

value.def: A pose is an insincere or exaggerated way of behaving that is intended to make a particular impression on other people.

example.ex: In many writers modesty is a pose, but in Ford it seems to have been genuine.
example.tran: 很多作家都是故作谦虚，但福特却似乎表里如一。

trans: 三角式；三角伸展式；三角学式

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to put, to place 放, 放置
rootsaffixes.title: pon, pound, pos(it)

partsOfSpeech.dec: ap 加强 + posit 放，放置 + e → 放到〔合适的位置〕→ 适当的
ap 表加强 + posit 放，放置 + ion 表名词 → 放在〔一起〕→ 并置
com 共同 + pon 放，放置 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 共同放到一起 → 组成的
com 共同 + pos 放，放置 + e → 放到一起 → 组成
com 共同 + posit 放，放置 + e → 放到一起 → 合成物
com 共同 + posit 放，放置 + ion 表名词 → 放到一起 → 组合 → 组合文字 → 作文
com 共同 + pos 放，放置 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 共同放置〔危险品〕→ 沉着
com 共同 + pound 放，放置 → 都放到一起 → 化合物
de 向下 + pos 放，放置 + e → 下放；下沉 → 免职；沉淀
de 向下 + posit 放，放置 → 放下不用 → 储存
deposit 储存 + ary 场所 → 储藏室
dis 不 + compose 组成 → 使不安
dis 分开 + pos 放，放置 + e → 分开〔排好〕→ 排列
dis 分散 + posit 放，放置 + ion 表名词 → 分开放 → 安排
ex 出 + pon 放，放置 + ent 表人 → 把〔内容〕讲出来 → 讲解者
ex 出 + pos 放，放置 + e → 放出来 → 暴露
ex 出 + posit 放，放置 + ion，expose 的名词 → 展览；解释
ex 出 + pound 放，放置 → 把〔意义〕说出来 → 详细说明
im 使… + pos 放，放置 + e → 强行放置 → 强加
im 使… + posit 放，放置 + ion，impose 的名词 → 征税；强加
im 进入 + pound 放，放置 → 放进去 → 把…围住；扣押
op 反 + pon 放，放置 + ent 具有…性质的 → 反着放 → 对立的
op 反 + posit 放，放置 + e → 放在对面 → 相对的
posit 放，放置 + ion 表名词 → 放出的〔立场〕
posit 放，放置 + ive …的 → 放在那 → 肯定的
post 后 + pon 放，放置 + e → 向后放 → 推迟
pro 向前 + pon 放，放置 + e →〔把意见〕往前放 → 提议
propon〔e〕提议，提出 + ent 表人 → 提议者
pro 前 + pos 放，放置 + al 表行为 → 向前放 → 提议
pro 向前 + pound 放，放置 → 向前放 → 提出
pur 始终 + pos 放，放置 + e → 始终放不下的东西 → 目的
re 一再 + pos 放，放置 + e → 一再放下〔工作〕→ 休息
re 加强 + posit 放，放置 + ory 表地点 → 放东西之地 → 仓库
sup 下 + pos 放，放置 + e → 在下面提出 → 推测
sup 下 + posit 放，放置 + ion 表名词 → 推测
trans 转移 + pose 位置 →〔互相〕移放 → 互换位置
